definition: contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: College students psychology of aversion is a big problem in campus security work.
sentences.chinese: 大学生的逆反心理给校园保卫工作带来了很大的影响。

sentences.english: My experience is not deliberately to train him, make him have a reverse psychology.
sentences.chinese: 我的经验是不要刻意的去训练他，使他产生逆反心理。

sentences.english: People with strong negative mentality tend to deem himself as a victim.
sentences.chinese: 有强烈逆反心理的人容易将自己视为受害者。

sentences.english: I’m sure it’s called reverse psychology these days.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这个现在叫做逆反心理。

sentences.english: The reverse psychology of their cheerful sense of doom worked well.
sentences.chinese: 对他们幸灾乐祸的高兴劲儿，逆反心理起了作用。

sentences.english: Inverse psychology is a general phenomenon in the process of the college moral education.
sentences.chinese: 逆反心理是当前高校学生思想教育过程中的一种现象。

definition: to be disgusted with/to dislike/bad reaction/antipathy
bored/fed up with sth/sick of sth
